column1: Name: DeltaStream 8-port Pizza-box GPON Optical Line Terminal

• 1× Alarm Port (Reserved)"

column1: Highlights: 8 GPON Ports: Supports 1:128 splitting ratio for every port—up to 1024 ONTs by one device.
High-Speed Uplink Ports: Provides 2× 10GE SFP+ ports and 1× gigabit uplink port.
Redundant Dual Power Supplies: Carrier-class reliability with dual hot-swapping AC+DC power supplies.
Complete L2 & Advanced L3 Functions: Satisfies the need for numerous commercial requirements.
Centralized Management: Via DeltaStream PON Management System (DPMS)

column3: and more meet the requirement for different applications.
